CustomField.formula: IF( OR( IsClosed, ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Target Account"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Waiting on Billing Pause"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Waiting on Billing Restart"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Informed of Potential Cancellation"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Discussing with Customer"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Engaged in Remediation"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Collections Concerns"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Final Negotiations"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"ACV Outcome Certain"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Waiting for Kickoff"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Approaching EUL Evaluation"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Discussing uplift with Account Owner"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Discussing Firm Wide Conversion"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Discussing uplift with Customer"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Developing license count recommendation"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Waiting for Finance to send bill"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Waiting for payment"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Opportunity Reset"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Expression of Interest"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Investigation"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Business Case Development"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Evaluation of Options"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Resolution of Concerns"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Get Management Approval"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Obtain Contract"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Trial Period"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Recurring Adjustment") ), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.label: Is Stage Current?
